attributes.action: Prosecute sex spammers on open forum on facebook to protect the teenagers that use them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Facebook was origionally set up for teenagers from the age of 13 onwards. The site has become very popular not only with teenagers but also adults. This has however caused a problem with people spamming network walls with sex adverts for websites purely set up for sex. We feel that these advertisers of such nature should be prosecuted to send a message that it will not be tolerated.
